About SourceFile

SourceFile is a private access download site for projects available on the Dusk&Rain GitHub and BreakingRain Security LLC GitHub. It was founded in 2022 and serves as a centralized hub for accessing and downloading various projects and resources provided by these organizations.

Our goal is to provide a convenient platform for users to explore and acquire the latest projects from Dusk&Rain and BreakingRain Security LLC. By offering a curated selection of software, tools, and resources, we aim to support developers and security enthusiasts in their projects and endeavors.

Please note that access to SourceFile is restricted to authorized individuals with valid credentials. If you are a member of Dusk&Rain or BreakingRain Security LLC, you can log in using your provided account information. For any inquiries or assistance, please reach out to our support team.
